forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain. Low 4C.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy and rainy. Lows overnight in the upper 30s.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 37F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 44F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 45F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 6C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 42F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 2C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 35F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers likely. High 7C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain...with scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low around 35F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 7C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 43F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 44F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 43F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
